name: Lion's Threat: Imperial Earth Bind
trigger: Add 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
text: Main: DON!! -2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

effect.text: K.O. up to 1 opponent Character with cost 5 or less.
Add 1 DON!! from DON deck and set as active.
